summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, providing a password for a drive containing discovery materials for inmate Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for whom discovery materials are being provided.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney who signed the letter providing the password for discovery materials.

connections.description: Audrey Strauss, as United States Attorney, is involved in the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell, as indicated by the correspondence regarding discovery materials.

events.title: Discovery Materials Password Transmission
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends a password for a drive containing discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center.

locations: Silvio J. Malfa Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
It confirms that discovery materials for Ghislaine Maxwell were stored on a password-protected drive.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence handling in the case as of August 2021.
